name: Warrior
description: Master of weapons and combat tactics

nodes.name: Improved Heroic Strike
nodes.description: Reduces the rage cost of Heroic Strike by 1 per point

nodes.name: Deflection
nodes.description: Increases your Parry chance by 1% per point

nodes.name: Improved Rend
nodes.description: Increases the bleed damage caused by your Rend ability by 15% per point

nodes.name: Tactical Mastery
nodes.description: You retain up to 5 rage points per point when you change stances

nodes.name: Improved Charge
nodes.description: Increases the amount of rage generated by Charge by 3 per point

nodes.name: Deep Wounds
nodes.description: Your critical strikes cause the target to bleed for additional damage over 12 sec

nodes.name: Bloodthirst
nodes.description: Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 45% of your attack power

nodes.name: Mortal Strike
nodes.description: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage and reduces healing effects on the target by 50% for 10 sec

nodes.name: Shield Slam
nodes.description: Slam the target with your shield, causing damage and dispelling a magic effect
